AboutMe

"Every artist was first an amateur."

BIO

Marko Ivancevic is a hobby artist and an urban sketcher currently residing in Vienna. For the last two years he has been devoted to learning and discovering the secrets of a painter.

From aquarell pens on paper to oil on canvas, in the learning process there is no place for one one direction or one material. Various techniques can be seen in the gallery of his images as well as various materials that he uses.

Youtube is the place where he has learned most of what he knows today. On this site and through his dedication to painting he wants to share his knowledge with everyone who wants to get involved in the world of painting and art.

Member of the group of Urban Sketchers in Vienna.
